metadata.title: CVE-2016-6346 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - low.
metadata.description:
RESTEasy enables GZIPInterceptor, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service via unspecified vectors.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-6346` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libresteasy-java - 3.1.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: resteasy package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.1.0-1').
